root.name: Cannon Fodder 3
root.description: StoryA follow-up of the Cannon Fodder 1 and 2 games from the early 90s. Do combat with a small group of soldiers and defeat the enemy wherever in the world they are causing trouble. Gameplay is a mix of strategy. The player can use 8 different types of machines and a variety of weapons to eliminate opponents.PC System RequirementsMinimumOS: Windows XP (SP2)Processor: Pentium IV 2,4 GHzMemory: 1024 MB RAMGraphics: GeForce 7800GTX/ATI RADEON X1800 XTDirectX®: 9.0cHard Drive: 700 MB HD spaceAdditional: Correct work on laptops is not guaranteed, Correct work on integrated graphic cards is not guaranteed.RecommendedProcessor: Core i3Memory: 2048 MB RAMDirectX®: 9.0cHard Drive: 1024 MB HD spaceAdditional: Correct work on laptops is not guaranteed, Correct work on integrated graphic cards is not guaranteed.
